short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves time of conversing with freelancers with the help of Ai generated messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You will need to add your Open Ai Key to use this extension as we currently don't have the capacity to support paying for open Ai credits.

It can help with generation of messages such as : 
1. Greeting freelancer
2. Telling freelancer to go through task brief
3. Telling freelancer to get to work after sending offer
4. Making excuse for not being able to review freelancer delivered job immediately.
5. Telling freelancer about wrong work submisssion.
6. Telling freelancer when deadline for submission is passed. 
7. Appreciating Freelancer for delivering an excellent job.

If you need messages to be generated for a scenario not included above yet, kindly comment so we can add it in the upcoming updates. 

Click on the icons beside messages to see the effect of this extension.

Thanks.
